channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2024040115
item.description:
Report X-2024040115

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-09T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-26
  • City: TAYLOR
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: UNLOADER NOTCIED SHIFTING WEIGHT AND SLOSHING LIQUID NOISE INSIDE PACKAGE WHILE UNLOADING. SET ASIDE AND HAD A SUPERVIOR LOOK AT IT. UPON INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED (2) PKGS HAD THE SAME TRACKING NUMBER; (1) BOX HAD AN INNER BOX MARKED WITH GROUND LTD QTY MARKING ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS: 1ZH0X6950310748612, 1ZH0X6950320361985, 1ZH0X6950330144012(2), 1ZH0X6950339278200 (2), 1ZH0X6950332180247, 1ZH0X6950316645981, 1ZH0X6950310558569, 1ZH0X6950313518936, 1ZH0X6950304759998, 1ZH0X6950312020171, 1ZH0X6950322463577, 1ZH0X6950337112196
